reviews.review: epic game! this was a skillgame ! :D not csgo kiddiegame for everyone .. -.-
This is basically Counter-Strike but with a story mode.  I like the story and the new multiplayer.  9/10

Condition Zero 跟 AI 队友循序渐进过关
c  和 x 两套指令对队友有效，你永远是队长
多使用cover me 让队友掩护自己收割，别傻傻
自己往上冲，死了就要等 AI 结束战斗，无比无聊
(cover me 也不是每次队友都响应，还有negative的)
我有些手残，目前只通关了普通难度
Hard 难度对配合和反应速度要求较高

Condition Zero Deleted Scenes 是有剧情的任务模式
有救人质的，有秘密潜入获取情报的。任务遍布世界各地，
也就是说你会听到各种国家口音的英语-.-
个人感觉开发组对亚洲人还是有些歧视的，日本那几关里面的
男性人质都是抱头跪地的，其它任务里人质受惊吓后虽然也
会抱头但没跪地，也没把头贴地上。个人看法，不喜勿喷

64位 Win 10 下有时会崩溃结束程序，重新进入后已完成的任务
会显示为未完成。希望及时出来更新修复

64位 Linux Mint 下暂时没有遇到上面的問題

中文语音“前进！前进！前进！”什么的实在太难听了，配音的应该
不是大陆出生的。不得不换回了英语~
其实英语国家的人也会觉得有点英语配音很傻~

总体来说不错的游戏
最早登陆大陆的游戏之一，经典！

es hatt diese gewisse etwas ! , es gibt einen einzespieler , und deutsche sprach , so wie textunterstützung !

CONDİTİON ZERO SÜREKLİ BAĞLANTI HATASI VERİYO SORUNU HALLEDER MİSİNİZ??

Sırf Counter-Strike'a hikaye vs eklenmiş diye oyuna olumlu gözüyle bakan insanlar var. Benim de onlara bir çift lafım var. Oyunda anlatılan herhangi bir hikaye yok. Her biri Mario seviyeleri gibi. Sadece ilerliyorsun. Önüne düşman çıktığı zaman da vuruyorsun. Hiç eğlenceli de değil açıkçası. Oyunu biraz daha dinamik yapayım derken de oyunun motorunu mahvetmişler zaten heryerde glitch yaşıyorum. Speedrun yapamıyorsunuz bu nedenlede. Sıkıcı bir shoot'em up oyunu işte. ayrıca yorumdakilerin annesini sikiyorum
old school but still nice sound
a brilliant classic for those who want a blast from the past play this

グラフィックの設定でwindowなんとかってのに変更したら、そこから画面がドアップになったまま戻らなくてプレイできません（´；ω；｀）　どうしたら戻るんだぁ～（´；ω；｀）
Четкая игра, не хуже версии 1.6 так скажем дополнение, есть как и мультиплеер так и прохождение.

Игра мне понравилась, в отличии от 1.6 сервера там не пустуют а играть с новыми персонажами стало куда интереснее, еще там есть миссии которые лично мне понравились. С самого начала у меня был уровень сложности {eazy} , но постепенно я делал его на 1 сложнось выше, в общем я не пожалел купив эту игру))) Спасибо за внимание)))

The main issue people found with Condition Zero was that it looked a lot like 1.6; although that claim is true this having mild graphical enhancements and plenty of bug fixes, it's still a great game. The multiplayer is like 1.6 but the true fun is to be had in deleted scenes - which if you don't know is essentially a counter strike 1.6 campaign mode and although not revolutinary now-a-days it's still a whole lot of fun. If you push aside the graphics there is a lot of fun to be had on this game and for all the hate it got it's still good old counter strike. So if you have some time spare or your getting sick of Global Offensive give this a try ( I recommend going on hard mode for the most enjoyment).

TL;DR
This is an underated gem - completely worth your time.

You can read my Counter Strike review and see how I got here, but CZ came out when I got back into CS after my first steam account was hacked over 10 years ago.  So I get a new account and go to buy CS and notice there is a newer version with a single player and updated graphics at the time.  I grabbed it as CS was one of my favorite shooters at the time and was not disappointed (aside from the single player mode) one bit.  The game was generally the same aside from some updates that really made me feel like I wasn't still playing a game that was 5 years old.  This trend obviously continues with Source and now GO, showing me my opinion at the time has been carried on by many.
wow, another classic! if youve read my review for counter strike (2000) it'll be the same as this!

Counter-Strike 1.6 For mods, it`s a good game

This game is way better than Counter Strike. First reason for this are missions. After you finish game on hardest difficult you can play Counter Strike multiplayer easly, cuz it's so hard, but I did it and I feel fantastic. Game is worth evry cent trust me.

Once again: Thank You For This Game.

Buen shooter para desconectar puesto que no hay historias y pocos puzles, es simplemente para estar un rato disparando a diestro y siniestro. Se hace un repaso por casi todas las armas del CS 1.6. El doblaje al español pues como toda la saga Half Life, es en este punto ya ridículo y gracioso. Lo único malo que tiene es que muchas veces aparecen enemigos por detrás que te revientan sin remedio y que para ser un shooter la munición a veces muy escasa y eso lleva a que tenga que cargar un archivo más antiguo para poder ahorrar munición en algunas zonas.

Bu oyun kötü olarak tanıtılsada güzel bir oyun. Tek sıkıntı botlarla oyun kuramıyoruz. O yüzden kötü anılıyor. Ama zevkli diyebilirim. Bunun yanında gelen (deleted scenes)de güzel bir mod olmakla birlikte tam bir hikayeye sahip değil. Oyundaki stealth bölümler (deleted scenes) vb. şeyler zevk verici.tadımlık oynanacak bir oyun.
